Expire_Info.Expire_Other_Info: Support is available only through the address written above. No other contact methods are possible. Remember this is a freeware project, therefore I cannot dedicate too much time and efforts to it. I will do my best to respond to any mail regarding this subject. You are welcome to send comments and suggestions to the author. You are also welcome to support the author by donation of literature,

English.Keywords: MPEG, Audio, Collection, MP3, Organizer, Tagger, Jurgen Faul, Music, Software, Freeware, Manager, Utility, Download, Free, Tool, Download, CD Cover, VBR, Layer, ID3, Multilingual, Property, Duplicate, MPEGplus, MPC, MP+, ID3v2, ID3v1, WAV, Twin, VQ
English.Char_Desc_45: An ultimate freeware utility for Windows
English.Char_Desc_80: An ultimate freeware utility for Windows 95/98/NT/2000/ME/XP
English.Char_Desc_250: It is designed to organize your audio file collection. It is fast and easy to use, scans selected drives for supported audio files and lists them in an Explorer-style tree-view interface.
English.Char_Desc_450: MAC - an ultimate freeware utility for Windows 95/98/NT/2000/ME/XP. It is designed to organize your audio file collection. It is fast and easy to use, scans selected drives for supported audio files and lists them in an Explorer-style tree-view interface. You can retrieve all information about your audio collection and you can play files as well.
English.Char_Desc_2000: MAC - an ultimate freeware utility for Windows 95/98/NT/2000/ME/XP. It is designed to organize your audio file collection. It is fast and easy to use, scans selected drives for supported audio files and lists them in an Explorer-style tree-view interface. You can retrieve all information about your audio collection and you can play files as well. Features: scanning for *.mp?, *.wav, *.vqf, *.ogg, *.mac, *.ape files; support for MPEG Audio, MPEGplus, WAV, TwinVQ, Ogg Vorbis, Monkey's Audio; file info: size, length, bit rate, sample rate, mode, version, layer; including ID3-tags (versions 1.0, 1.1, 2.3, 2.4); collection, volume and folder information; searching for name, property, ID3-tag or duplicates; searching in collection or on a drive; saving search results; playing file(s) with its associated application; creating playlists; ID3-tag editor (ID3-tags version 1.1 only); support Xing VBR; auto open last collection option; importing >from another collection; support for very big collections; updating volumes; several collection reports (TXT, HTML, DIF); multilingual interface; printing CD-covers; file rename utility

Permissions.EULA: Copyright (c) 2000, 2001 by Jurgen Faul All rights reserved by the author. This program is freeware for all purposes.
